Telephone, Security, Heating system: central, gas, Hot water: gas 
 Flats for sale in Borjomi, the best place at the entrance of Borjomi Park. The beautiful 5-storey building. Apartments will be finished in fall of 2014, full frame of completed, according to the agreement. Hotel-style apartments will be managed by the company. If you wish to rent. Construction is done in accordance with the highest standards. The building will have a living room, laundry room, common lobby, open cafe and car parking for 10 cars. Total 20 apartments, so hurry up. Prices start from $ 1700 for square meter. The construction is carried out by a foreign company.
